TEXT.TITLE: P.A.M. TRANSPORTATION <PTSI> PRESIDENT RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: P.A.M. Transportation Services Inc said president and board member Robert Weaver resigned to pursue other interests. The company said its board elected chairman Paul Maestri to the additional post of president. Reuter
